titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of the duty on chloramino base.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8827-8828)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on 4-chloro-2,5-dimethoxyaniline (also known as chloramino base).
